description: Table read by antidiagonals: T(n,k) = n^trinv(k)+n^(k-((trinv(k)*(trinv(k)-1))/2)) where trinv (k) = floor((1+sqrt(1+8*k))/2) and with 0^0 = 1.
crossrefs: Rows include A010054 (apart from initial term), A007395 and A048645 (offset). Subsequent rows are sums of two powers of a given number and also rewritings of A052216 from a particular base to base 10. Columns include A007395, A000027, A005843, A002522, A002378, A001105, A001093, A034262, A011379, A033431, A002523.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 22 2000
